courses.name: Basics Japanese
courses.description: Perfect for complete beginners! Learn the foundation of Japanese language including hiragana, katakana, and basic phrases.

courses.name: JLPT N5
courses.description: Master the most basic level of Japanese proficiency test. Learn essential grammar, vocabulary, and kanji.

courses.name: JLPT N4
courses.description: Build on your N5 knowledge with more complex grammar patterns and everyday vocabulary.

courses.name: JLPT N3
courses.description: Intermediate level Japanese with complex sentence structures and business vocabulary.

courses.name: JLPT N2
courses.description: Upper intermediate level with advanced grammar and reading comprehension skills.

courses.name: JLPT N1
courses.description: Master level Japanese proficiency with complex texts and nuanced language understanding.
